item.title: Trance
item.dc:creator: knitschmann
item.description: kicking things off in 2014 with a more abstract version of an already well known style showcasing emotion through colors. Abstract elements by “VisualFreaks”. Photographer: Alexander Yakovlev (Russia) First published in March 2014 available around the web deviantART | Behance Network | Shadowness
item.content:encoded:
kicking things off in 2014 with a more abstract version of an already well known style showcasing emotion through colors. Abstract elements by “VisualFreaks”.

Photographer: Alexander Yakovlev (Russia)
First published in March 2014

available around the web

deviantART | Behance Network | Shadowness

item.title: Hush Hush
item.dc:creator: knitschmann
item.description: a darker interpretation of my color design supporting a more mysterious and emotional look. Photographer: George Mayer (Russia) First published in October 2013 available around the web deviantART | Behance Network | Shadowness
item.content:encoded:
a darker interpretation of my color design supporting a more mysterious and emotional look.

Photographer: George Mayer (Russia)
First published in October 2013

available around the web

deviantART | Behance Network | Shadowness

item.title: Style
item.dc:creator: knitschmann
item.description: another very colorful photo manipulation starring a lovely fashion model. While her clothes build their very own piece of art within that picture, the abstract effects add a whole new level of depth and insight to this vogue photograph. Photographer: Novic Arman Zhenikeyev (Kazakhstan) First published in October 2012 available around the web deviantART | […]
item.content:encoded:
another very colorful photo manipulation starring a lovely fashion model. While her clothes build their very own piece of art within that picture, the abstract effects add a whole new level of depth and insight to this vogue photograph.

Photographer: Novic Arman Zhenikeyev (Kazakhstan)
First published in October 2012

available around the web

deviantART | Behance Network | Shadowness

item.title: Pure
item.dc:creator: knitschmann
item.description: flowing energy expressing power & freedom. Carefully picked fresh colors in combination with gently scattered details to maintain a pure look. Case study & tutorial created exclusively for webdesign.org and available via their website in Summer 2011. Photographer: Alexander Yakovlev (Russia) First published in December 2010 available around the web deviantART | Behance Network | […]
item.content:encoded:
flowing energy expressing power & freedom. Carefully picked fresh colors in combination with gently scattered details to maintain a pure look.

Case study & tutorial created exclusively for webdesign.org and available via their website in Summer 2011.

Photographer: Alexander Yakovlev (Russia)
First published in December 2010

available around the web

deviantART | Behance Network | Shadowness

item.title: Your Turn
item.dc:creator: knitschmann
item.description: another artwork exposing high detail in every inch. Yellow highlights providing depth in an overall purple/red based atmosphere of a male hip hop dancer with a prompting body language supported by strong colors focussing on his gesture. Photographer:Gino Santa Maria (USA) First published in August 2011 available around the web deviantART | Behance Network | […]
item.content:encoded:
another artwork exposing high detail in every inch.
Yellow highlights providing depth in an overall purple/red based atmosphere of a male
hip hop dancer with a prompting body language supported by strong colors focussing on his gesture.

Photographer:Gino Santa Maria (USA)
First published in August 2011

available around the web

deviantART | Behance Network | Shadowness

item.title: rdy
item.dc:creator: knitschmann
item.description: surreal photo manipulation pulsating with energy expressed by warm colors while keeping a relaxed tone provided by a cool male model wearing sunglasses. Photographer: Roxana Gonzalez (Cuba) First published in July 2011 available around the web deviantART | Behance Network | Shadowness
item.content:encoded:
surreal photo manipulation pulsating with energy expressed by warm colors while keeping a relaxed tone provided by a cool male model wearing sunglasses.

Photographer: Roxana Gonzalez (Cuba)
First published in July 2011

available around the web

deviantART | Behance Network | Shadowness

item.title: Elegance
item.dc:creator: knitschmann
item.description: true to it’s title, the artwork piece “Elegance” showcases a more traditional and static pose than usual. The effects only add a small color effect to not intervene with the clarity of this piece of traditional ballet dancing. Photographer: Alexander Yakovlev (Russia) First published in October 2012 available around the web deviantART | Behance Network […]
item.content:encoded:
true to it’s title, the artwork piece “Elegance” showcases a more traditional and static pose than usual. The effects only add a small color effect to not intervene with the clarity of this piece of traditional ballet dancing.

Photographer: Alexander Yakovlev (Russia)
First published in October 2012

available around the web

deviantART | Behance Network | Shadowness

item.title: tmptd
item.dc:creator: knitschmann
item.description: short for ‘tempted’ the artwork piece ‘tmptd’ tries to make people think outside the box – not only by it’s creative modern title. Visualized energy streams, exploding debris and fire bursts make this manipulation come to live aeiko style. For more information concerning that topic be sure to check out the “Inspiration Guide For Designers” […]
item.content:encoded:
short for ‘tempted’ the artwork piece ‘tmptd’ tries to make people think outside the box – not only by it’s creative modern title. Visualized energy streams, exploding debris and fire bursts make this manipulation come to live aeiko style. For more information concerning that topic be sure to check out the “Inspiration Guide For Designers” by the Abduzeedo team.

Photographer: Branislav Ostojic (Serbia)
First published in August 2011

available around the web

deviantART | Behance Network | Shadowness

item.title: Sound
item.dc:creator: knitschmann
item.description: captured moment of intense dancing while feeling the sound in your ears and feet. Equalizer bars in the background and various abstract elements full of energy to support the essence of being in motion on the dancefloor rounded up by loud colors. Photographer: Alexander Yakovlev (Russia) First published in May 2011 available around the web […]
item.content:encoded:
captured moment of intense dancing while feeling the sound in your ears and feet.

Equalizer bars in the background and various abstract elements full of energy to support the essence of being in motion on the dancefloor rounded up by loud colors.

Photographer: Alexander Yakovlev (Russia)
First published in May 2011

available around the web

deviantART | Behance Network | Shadowness

item.title: Vibes
item.dc:creator: knitschmann
item.description: self-created smoke & nebula effects with the help of FlamePainter. Vintage floral pattern of the wall combined with futuristic visuals. Photographer: Alexander Yakovlev (Russia) First published in May 2011 available around the web deviantART | Behance Network | Shadowness
item.content:encoded:
self-created smoke & nebula effects with the help of FlamePainter. Vintage floral pattern of the wall combined with futuristic visuals.

Photographer: Alexander Yakovlev (Russia)
First published in May 2011

available around the web

deviantART | Behance Network | Shadowness
